mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (id, password, name, gender, phone, email, host) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{host})
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, gender, phone, email, host FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Authority a ON m.id = a.memberId WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, password, password, name, gender, phone, email, host FROM Member WHERE email = #{email}
